title: MCPlas general input dataset schema
description: A schema for defining general input data for building a COMSOL model via the MCPlas toolbox.

source.title: Plasma Source
source.description: Device which creates the plasma in a given medium.

name.title: Source Name
name.description: Name and/or type of the plasma source used in the study. Examples: kINPen, COST Jet, CCP.

application.title: Source Application
application.description: Application the plasma source is used for. Examples: decontamination, PECVD, etching.

specification.title: Source Specification
specification.description: Technical specification of the plasma source (waveform, frequency range, pressure range, temperature range).

geometry_settings.title: Geometry settings
geometry_settings.description: Object including all attributes defining the configuration of the plasma setup such as the type of plasma device used (e.g., DBD, plasma jet, corona discharge, etc.), its physical shape, structure, dimensions, and materials.

geometry_description.title: Geometry description
geometry_description.description: Free text description of the source geometry and materials.

gap_distance.title: Gap distance [m]
gap_distance.description: This term refers to the effective space in which plasma formation occurs.

diel_thickness_powered.title: Thickness of the dielectric layer on the powered electrode [m]
diel_thickness_powered.description: If the powered electrode has no dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

diel_thickness_grounded.title: Thickness of the dielectric layer on the grounded electrode [m]
diel_thickness_grounded.description: If the grounded electrode has no dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

rect_electode.title: Rectangular electrodes
rect_electode.description: Electrode dimensions in the case of a rectangular shape. If the electrodes are not rectangular, all values in this section should be set to zero.

circ_electrode.title: Circular electrodes
circ_electrode.description: Electrode dimensions in the case of a circular shape. If the electrodes are not circular, all values in this section should be set to zero.

coax_eletrode.title: Coaxial electrodes
coax_eletrode.description: Electrode dimensions in the case of a coaxial configuration. If the configuration of the electrodes is not coaxial, all values in this section should be set to zero.

source_settings.title: Source settings
source_settings.description: Object including all attributes of the plasma source used to generate the desired plasma.

applied_voltage.title: Applied voltage [V]
applied_voltage.description: In the case of DC discharge, this field defines the value of constant voltage applied on a powered electrode. In the case of RF discharge, this field defines the amplitude of the applied voltage on a powered electrode.

voltage_frequency.title: Frequency of applied voltage [Hz]
voltage_frequency.description: Frequency of the applied voltage. In the case of DC discharge, the value in this field should be zero.

discharge_current.title: Discharge current [A]
discharge_current.description: Current passing through the plasma discharge.

dissipated_power.title: Dissipated power [W]
dissipated_power.description: Power actually used by the plasma discharge, excluding losses.

perm_diel_powered.title: Relative permitivity of dielectric on powered electrode
perm_diel_powered.description: If the powered electrode has no dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

perm_diel_grounded.title: Relative permitivity of dielectric on grounded electrode
perm_diel_grounded.description: If the grounded electrode has no dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

procedure.title: Source Procedure
procedure.description: Procedure to prepare and use the plasma source.

medium.title: Plasma Medium
medium.description: Gas, mixture of gases, or other substance, which is either (partially) ionized or otherwise activated by a source device.

name.title: Medium Name
name.description: Name of the medium the plasma source is operated in. Examples: dry air, Ar, CO2, water.

gas_properties.title: Gas properties
gas_properties.description: Object including all attributes defining the carrier gas.

gas_description.title: Gas description
gas_description.description: Free text description of the carrier gas.

pressure.title: Pressure [Pa]
pressure.description: Pressure of the carrier gas during plasma operation.

carrier_gas_composition.title: Carrier gas composition
carrier_gas_composition.description: Free text about composition of the gas mixture used in the plasma (e.g., 90% N₂, 10% O₂).

temperature.title: Temperature [°C]
temperature.description: Temperature of the gas during plasma operation.

sec_emiss_coeff.title: Secondary electron emission coefficient
sec_emiss_coeff.description: Secondary electron emission coefficient at different surfaces

ele_powered.title: At powered electrode
ele_powered.description: If the powered electrode is covered by dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

ele_grounded.title: At grounded electrode
ele_grounded.description: If the grounded electrode is covered by dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

diel_powered.title: At dielectric on powered electrode
diel_powered.description: If the powered electrode has no dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

diel_grounded.title: At dielectric on grounded electrode
diel_grounded.description: If the grounded electrode has no dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

sec_ele_energy.title: Energy of secondary electrons
sec_ele_energy.description: Energy of secondary electrons emitted from different surfaces

ele_powered.title: At powered electrode [eV]
ele_powered.description: If the powered electrode is covered by dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

ele_grounded.title: At grounded electrode [eV]
ele_grounded.description: If the grounded electrode is covered by dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

diel_powered.title: At dielectric on powered electrode [eV]
diel_powered.description: If the powered electrode has no dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

diel_grounded.title: At dielectric on grounded electrode [eV]
diel_grounded.description: If the grounded electrode has no dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

ele_powered.title: At powered electrode
ele_powered.description: If the powered electrode is covered by dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

ele_grounded.title: At grounded electrode
ele_grounded.description: If the grounded electrode is covered by dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

diel_powered.title: At dielectric on powered electrode
diel_powered.description: If the powered electrode has no dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

diel_grounded.title: At dielectric on gronded electrode
diel_grounded.description: If the grounded electrode has no dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

init_dens.title: Initial number density [1/m^3]
init_dens.description: This field defines initial number density of electrons necessary for the plasma source modelling.

init_ene.title: Initial mean electron energy [eV]
init_ene.description: This field defines initial mean electron energy necessary for the plasma source modelling.

name.title: Species name
name.description: Definition of species name. The name must be one of those defined in the JSON file containing the reaction kinetic model data.

background.title: Content percentage in background gas  [%]
background.description: This field defines the value of the species fraction in the background gas.

name.title: Species name
name.description: Definition of species name. The name must be one of those defined in the JSON file containing the reaction kinetic model data.

refl_diel_powered.title: Reflection coefficient at dielectric on powered electrode
refl_diel_powered.description: If the powered electrode has no dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

refl_diel_grounded.title: Reflection coefficient at dielectric on grounded electrode
refl_diel_grounded.description: If the grounded electrode has no dielectric layer, the value in this field should be set to zero.

int_dens.title: Initial number density [1/m^3]
int_dens.description: This field defines initial number density necessary for the plasma source modelling.

procedure.title: Medium Procedure
procedure.description: Standard procedure to prepare the medium (pre-treatment).

target.title: Plasma Target
target.description: Substrate the plasma acts on, directly (target is/was in contact with a plasma) or mediated by an additional substance.

procedure.title: Target Procedure
procedure.description: Standard procedure to prepare the target.

diagnostics.title: Diagnostics
diagnostics.description: Measurement, modeling, or simulation method used to produce the digital resource.

name.title: Diagnostics Name
name.description: Name of the applied diagnostics and/or modelling/simulation methods. Examples: OES, SEM, PIC-MCC.

diagnostic_settings.title: Fluid-Poisson model settings
diagnostic_settings.description: Object include attributes necessary to setup Fluid-Poisson model via MSPlas.

spatial_dimensions.title: Modelling geometry
spatial_dimensions.description:
This field gives information about the spatial dimensions and coordinate types used in the model. It considers the following:
1D - one-dimensional modelling,
1p5D - one-dimensional modelling (polar coordinate),
2D - two-dimensional modelling (Cartesian coordinates),
2p5D - two-dimensional modelling (cylindrical coordinates).

electron_flux.title: Drift-diffusion approximation
electron_flux.description: This field defines drift-diffusion approximation used in the model. For improved drift-diffusion approximation choose "DDAn", while for drift-diffusion approximation where diffusion and mobility of electron energy are defined as 5/3UeDe and 5/3Uebe choose "DDA53". For conventional drift-diffusion approximation choose "DDAc". Details about mentioned approximations can be found in M. M. Becker and D. Loffhagen, AIP ADVANCES 3, 012108 (2013).

log_formulation.title: Logarithmic formulation of species density and mean electron energy
log_formulation.description: The use of logarithmic formulation is often recommended in practice, since it has been shown to improve numerical stability.

stabilization.title: Source term stabilization
stabilization.description: Include source term stabilisation for species number density and mean electron energy balance equations to improve the numerical stability of simulations.

nojac.title: "nojac" operator
nojac.description: "In COMSOL Multiphysics, the nojac operator is used to exclude specific expressions from the Jacobian matrix computation during numerical simulations. This can lead to reduced memory usage and potentially faster computation times, as the solver avoids unnecessary calculations"

element_number.title: Number of spatial steps
element_number.description: This field defines a number of spatial steps in the plasma domain for 1D and 1p5D geometries. The value in this field should be set to zero for other geometries (2D and 2p5D).

element_size.title: Maximum element size in triangular mesh [m]
element_size.description: This field defines the maximum size of triangular elements in the plasma domain for 2D and 2p5D geometries. The value in this field should be set to zero for other geometries (1D and 1p5D).

time_step.title: Time step for output [s]
time_step.description: Time step for the output defines the time points between the start and end of the output time.

filetype.title: Resource Filetype
filetype.description: File type of the resource. Examples: csv, pdf, png, txt.

datatype.title: Resource Datatype
datatype.description: Data type of the resource. Examples: data table, SEM image, cfu-plot, high-speed video.

range.title: Resource Range
range.description: Range in which the resource is valid. Example: wavelength range: 400-800 nm.

quality.title: Resource Quality
quality.description: Data quality score. One of: verified, published, reviewed.
